title: Reducing Use of Computed Tomography for the Diagnosis of Appendicitis in a Pediatric Emergency Department
details: C Chappell, JM Rinnan, K Fahmy, AL Beres - 2025
abstract: Acute appendicitis is the most common reason for surgical evaluation and management in children. In many cases appendicitis can be diagnosed clinically by history and physical examination, but imaging is often used as an adjunct for …
